basic.description: This course examines the role and value of the arts for the child, while exploring developmental trends, appropriate practices, methods, media and curricula of music, art, movement, dance, and drama.
basic.subject: EEC
basic.title: Expressive Arts for the Young Child

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Admittance to the ECE program. Corequisite: Block I undergraduate courses of ECE program.
